Class ReversiView

  • java.lang.Object
    • ReversiView
  • public class ReversiView
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a view that interacts with a controller.
    Author:
    Sekyun Oh

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ReversiView​(ReversiController controller)
      ReversiView(controller: ReversiController) This is a param-constructor to initialize the controller and a scanner.

      • getInput

        public void getInput()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        getInput() This function receives a input from a user. After the user places, the computer places automatically.
        Throws:

      • isCornerCase

        public boolean isCornerCase()
        isCornerCase() This function checks if there are no legal moves for both human and computer.

      • winner

        public java.lang.String winner()
        winner() This function finds a winner of the game, but it can be a tie.
        Returns:
        a String value that would be the winner or tie.
